SARNIESDesign System v1.2

SARNIES

Design System

Master specification for all Sarnies digital products. Marketing website, loyalty app, and internal tools.

PrinciplesTypographyColorsSpacingButtonsCardsFormsBadgesNavigationForbidden
0

Core Principles

MANDATORY

01

Editorial over UI

Design like a magazine, not a dashboard.

02

Spacing over decoration

Let content breathe. Avoid visual clutter.

03

Black & white first

Color is contextual, not primary.

04

Real content over tricks

No gradients, glass, or blur effects.

05

Confidence through restraint

If a component draws attention - it is wrong.

1

Typography System

Inter (Circular Std alternative). Medium for titles, Book for body.

Weights

  • Book - body, descriptions
  • Medium - headings, labels, nav
  • ❌ No Bold body text

Case Rules

  • Headings / nav: ALL CAPS
  • Body text: sentence case
  • ❌ No mixed casing in headers

Tracking

  • Headings: +200 to +300
  • Body: -10
  • Navigation: +200

TYPE SCALE (DESKTOP)

H1

40-44px

SARNIES SINGAPORE

Hero only
H2

28-32px

YOUR BENEFITS

Page titles
H3

20-22px

HOW IT WORKS

Section titles
Title

1.1x body

TITLE LABEL

Card titles, labels
Body

15-16px

View all your employee vouchers and redeem benefits at any Sarnies location.

Default
Small

13px

3 redemptions remaining today

Meta / captions
2

Color System

Black & white first. Accent colors are contextual only.

CORE NEUTRALS (GLOBAL)

black

#000000

gray-900

#0E0E0E

gray-700

#2A2A2A

gray-500

#6F6F6F

gray-300

#CFCFCF

gray-100

#F5F5F5

white

#FFFFFF

ACCENT COLORS (CONTEXTUAL ONLY)

Accents are per page / per product. Never use for primary text.

Progress barsPills / badgesBackground sectionsHighlights
3

Spacing System

8px grid. When unsure - use more space, not less.

SPACING SCALE

micro
4px
xs
8px
sm
16px
md
24px
lg
32px
xl
48px
2xl
64px
hero
96px

Page Padding

  • Desktop: 48px min
  • Tablet: 32px
  • Mobile: 20-24px

Content Width

  • Max width: 1200-1280px
  • Text-heavy: 720-840px

Vertical Rhythm

  • Section separation: 64-96px
  • Component spacing: 24-48px
9

Buttons

No gradients. No pills. No shadows. No icons in primary CTAs.

PRIMARY

Black background · White text · Tracking +200 · Padding 14px 20px · Radius 0-4px

SECONDARY

White background · 1px black border · Hover: opacity only

GHOST / LINK

Text only · No underline by default · Hover: underline · Use ↗ character only

8

Cards & Containers

Cards must blend into layout. No shadows. No floating.

STANDARD CARD

BROWSE ALL BENEFITS

View all your employee vouchers and redeem at any location.

Background: #FFFFFF · Border: 1px #E5E5E5 · Radius: 0-4px · Padding: 24-32px

DARK CARD

Welcome back

SUNDAY

Employee #000022

10

Forms & Inputs

Underline-only inputs. Focus: black underline. Errors: text-only.

This field is required

13

Badges & Status

Small, contextual color only. Minimal.

STATUS BADGES

Active Pending Expired Info

FEATURE BADGES

FeaturedNewEmployee
5

Navigation

Height: 72px desktop / 64px mobile. Logo left, nav right.

HEADER BAR

SARNIES
MenuLocationsAbout

ALL CAPS · Tracking +200 · Hover: opacity 85% · No underlines · No icons · No pills

BOTTOM TAB BAR

Height: 68px + safe area · Active: accent dot indicator · No separators

15

Explicitly Forbidden

GLOBAL RULES

Centered page titles
Decorative icons
Shadows as default
Gradients
Glass/blur effects
Pill-shaped buttons
Tight edge alignment
Over-designed components
Bold body text
Mixed casing in headers
Icons in primary CTAs
Rounded image corners
-

Design Tokens

CSS Custom Properties

:root {
  /* Colors */
  --color-black: #000000;
  --color-white: #FFFFFF;
  --color-gray-900: #0E0E0E;
  --color-gray-700: #2A2A2A;
  --color-gray-500: #6F6F6F;
  --color-gray-300: #CFCFCF;
  --color-gray-100: #F5F5F5;

  /* Accent (contextual) */
  --color-accent: #D4A853;
  --color-accent-muted: rgba(212, 168, 83, 0.15);

  /* Typography */
  --font-primary: 'Circular Std', -apple-system, sans-serif;
  --tracking-tight: -0.01em;
  --tracking-wide: 0.1em;
  --tracking-wider: 0.2em;
  --tracking-widest: 0.3em;

  /* Spacing (8px grid) */
  --space-1: 4px;
  --space-2: 8px;
  --space-4: 16px;
  --space-6: 24px;
  --space-8: 32px;
  --space-12: 48px;
  --space-16: 64px;
  --space-24: 96px;

  /* Layout */
  --container-max: 1280px;
  --container-content: 840px;
  --header-height: 72px;
  --bottom-nav-height: 68px;

  /* Borders */
  --radius-none: 0;
  --radius-sm: 2px;
  --radius-default: 4px;
  --border-color: #E5E5E5;
}

SARNIES DESIGN SYSTEM · V1.2 · DECEMBER 2025

Anything not defined here should not exist unless explicitly approved.
